analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

translated: It is because

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam yin no //
translated: it is the very same aspiration of the Tathāgata himself in the past.

original: de bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pas dad par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pas dad par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should have faith in the Blessed Buddhas with a higher motivation.

original: 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dad par byed pa ni don chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dad par byed pa ni don chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, those who have faith in the Blessed Buddhas will come to possess great benefit.

original: sems dad pa gcig gis gang 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sems dad pa gcig gis gang 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur te /
translated: By a single faithful thought, one will attain whatever is desired.

original: gang 'di 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag gtams pa 'dzin par mdzad pa rnams la gang dag sems dad pa gcig gis thal mo sbyar te /
analyzed: gang 'di 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag gtams pa 'dzin par mdzad pa rnams la gang dag sems dad pa gcig gis thal mo sbyar te /
translated: Those who, with a single faithful thought, join their palms in reverence

original: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu smras nas byams pa la gnas par byed pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu smras nas byams pa la gnas par byed pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
translated: and say the words “Homage to the Buddha” to those who hold the treasury of such Tathāgatas, and abide in loving-kindness, will not turn back from unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pas sems dad na chos 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pas sems dad na chos 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one has faith in these teachings with a superior intention, one will perfect them.

original: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should constantly recite the name of the Tathāgata.

original: theg pa des 'gro bar 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i yon tan rjes su dran par byas nas bskal pa bcu bzhir 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: theg pa des 'gro bar 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i yon tan rjes su dran par byas nas bskal pa bcu bzhir 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: One who wishes to go by this vehicle, having recalled the qualities of that Tathāgata, will turn away from saṃsāra for fourteen eons.

original: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag nyis stong na 'jig rten gyi khams skar ma'i rgyal po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na /
analyzed: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag nyis stong na 'jig rten gyi khams skar ma'i rgyal po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na /
translated: Two thousand buddhafields from here, in the world system called Endowed with the King of Stars,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas s'a la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas s'a la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
translated: the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, King of the Sāl Tree, resides.

original: yang sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: yang sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Moreover, Śāriputra,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa s'a la'i rgyal po'i mtshan gang dag thos nas @14a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa s'a la'i rgyal po'i mtshan gang dag thos nas @14a *//
translated: those who hear the name of the Tathāgata King of the Sāl Tree

original: dad par mi byed cing 'phya ba dang / sting pa de dag ni lo stong phrag drug cur sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom du btso bar 'gyur /
analyzed: dad par mi byed cing 'phya ba dang / sting pa de dag ni lo stong phrag drug cur sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom du btso bar 'gyur /
translated: Those who do not have faith in it, who mock it, and who disparage it will be boiled for sixty thousand years in the great Saṃghāta hell.

original: ma dad do zhes tshig tu smras pas lo stong phrag bdun du yi dvags me mdag za ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma dad do zhes tshig tu smras pas lo stong phrag bdun du yi dvags me mdag za ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who say, ‘I have no faith in it,’ will experience the suffering of eating glowing embers for seven thousand years.

original: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga bcu rtsa lnga na 'jig rten kyi khams stobs ldan zhes bya ba na /
analyzed: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga bcu rtsa lnga na 'jig rten kyi khams stobs ldan zhes bya ba na /
translated: Fifty-five buddhafields away, in the world system called Powerful,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon chas nyon mongs pa sel ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon chas nyon mongs pa sel ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
translated: the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha Hero-Firm-Army-Weapon-Dispelling-Afflictions resides.

original: yang sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: yang sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon chas nyon mongs pa sel pa'i mtshan gang dag thos par 'gyur ba ni tha na rmi lam gyi tshe na'ang rdo rje lta bur 'gyur /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon chas nyon mongs pa sel pa'i mtshan gang dag thos par 'gyur ba ni tha na rmi lam gyi tshe na'ang rdo rje lta bur 'gyur /
translated: those who hear the name of the thus-gone Hero-Firm-Army-Weapon-Dispelling-Afflictions will become like a vajra, even in their dreams.

original: bdud dang / bdud kyi 'khor gyis gdul dka' bar 'gyur /
analyzed: bdud dang / bdud kyi 'khor gyis gdul dka' bar 'gyur /
translated: It will be difficult for Māra and his retinue to subdue them.

original: g-yul chen po las kyang sgrol bar byed pa dang / gang 'di thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang 'thob bo //
analyzed: g-yul chen po las kyang sgrol bar byed pa dang / gang 'di thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang 'thob bo //
translated: They will be liberated from great battles and will attain the wisdom of omniscience.

original: yang sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: yang sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra,

original: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan dran pa tsam gyis dad pa skyed pa dang / dga' bar byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan dran pa tsam gyis dad pa skyed pa dang / dga' bar byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: those sons or daughters of good family who, merely by recollecting the name of that Tathāgata, will give rise to faith and delight,

original: rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa spyod pa na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa spyod pa na /
translated: while practicing the conduct for the sake of awakening,

original: bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / mthar phyin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / mthar phyin par shes par bya'o //
translated: will know that they have seen the Tathāgata and will reach the end.

original: yang de dag gis byang chub kyi sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: yang de dag gis byang chub kyi sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste /
translated: Moreover, they should give rise to the thought of awakening in this way:

original: bdag cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi @14b ldog par bya /
analyzed: bdag cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi @14b ldog par bya /
translated: ‘We will not turn back from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rgya cher sems yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: rgya cher sems yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya'o //
translated: We will greatly delight in the mind.’

original: gang dag las bdag cag gis mtshan 'di rna lam du grag cing thos pa dang / dga' ba yang dag par bskyad nas sems can mang po'i don byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang dag las bdag cag gis mtshan 'di rna lam du grag cing thos pa dang / dga' ba yang dag par bskyad nas sems can mang po'i don byed par 'gyur te /
translated: “Those who hear the name of this thus-gone one and, having heard it, give rise to joy and work for the benefit of many beings,

original: de ltar rdzu 'phrul che'o //
analyzed: de ltar rdzu 'phrul che'o //
translated: will have such great miraculous powers.

original: yang sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: yang sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gang dag nyan cing thos nas kyang mos par byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ci yod pa de'i phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gang dag nyan cing thos nas kyang mos par byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ci yod pa de'i phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o //
translated: I will explain a fraction of the amount of merit that exists for those who hear the name of the thus-gone one and, having heard it, feel devotion.

original: gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rin po ches rab tu gang bar byas te /
analyzed: gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rin po ches rab tu gang bar byas te /
translated: Suppose someone were to fill with jewels as many world systems as there are grains of sand in the Ganges river.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la nyin re zhing sbyin pa phul ba de ltar gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i bskal par phul ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po des /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la nyin re zhing sbyin pa phul ba de ltar gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i bskal par phul ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po des /
translated: And suppose that person were to offer this to the blessed buddhas as numerous as the grains of sand in the Ganges river every day, and were to continue doing so for eons as numerous as the grains of sand in the Ganges river.

original: mtshan thos pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i cha 'ga' tsam du'ang brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan thos pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i cha 'ga' tsam du'ang brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not even mention a fraction of the heap of merit that comes from hearing his name.

original: gal te la la zhig gis mtshan 'di mnyan par bya'o snyam nas 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin na /
analyzed: gal te la la zhig gis mtshan 'di mnyan par bya'o snyam nas 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin na /
translated: If someone were to think, ‘I will listen to this name,’ and were to give a gift of that many world systems filled with the seven precious substances,

original: de 'ang bsod nams ma byas pas de thos par mi nus so //
analyzed: de 'ang bsod nams ma byas pas de thos par mi nus so //
translated: but if they had not created merit, they would not be able to hear it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ji ste bsod nams ma byas par thos par 'gyur na ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams dang / lha tshe ring po rnams kyis kyang thos pa dang / yon tan brjod pa 'di shes par 'gyur te /🔽de dag thams cad bsod nams @15a *//
analyzed: ji ste bsod nams ma byas par thos par 'gyur na ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams dang / lha tshe ring po rnams kyis kyang thos pa dang / yon tan brjod pa 'di shes par 'gyur te / de dag thams cad bsod nams @15a *//
translated: If it were possible to hear it without creating merit, then beings in the hells, animals, and the world of Yama, as well as the long-lived gods, would hear it and know this description of the qualities.

original: kyi phung po de snyed dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kyi phung po de snyed dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: All of them would possess that heap of merit.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpal ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpal ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
translated: In the world system called Glorious, in the buddhafield called Tenth, dwells the tathagata, the arhat, the perfectly enlightened buddha called Heart of Glory of Light.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Shariputra,

original: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan nyan pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis mos pa de dag thams cad bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan nyan pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis mos pa de dag thams cad bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: all those who hear the name of that tathagata and who believe with a mind that is in a state of higher intention will all acquire immeasurable heaps of merit.

original: de dag ni ngan song gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur te smon lam ci 'dra bar smon lam 'debs pa de 'dra bas sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag ni ngan song gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur te smon lam ci 'dra bar smon lam 'debs pa de 'dra bas sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not fear the lower realms, and they will pass into parinirvana through the unsurpassed vehicle of the buddhas, in accordance with the aspirations they have made.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung /
translated: Whether the tathagatas are present

original: mya ngan las 'das kyang rung /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das kyang rung /
translated: or have passed into parinirvana,

original: gang gis mtshan thos pa de dag thams cad theg pa chen po'i bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis mtshan thos pa de dag thams cad theg pa chen po'i bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: All those who hear his name will be endowed with the happiness and mental joy of the Great Vehicle.

original: lha dang / mi'i nang na 'khor ba na'ang smon lam ji ltar btab pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha dang / mi'i nang na 'khor ba na'ang smon lam ji ltar btab pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Even while wandering in the realms of gods and humans, they will attain final nirvāṇa through the great array of qualities of a buddha field, just as they have wished.

original: sangs rgyas las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni de lta bu ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni de lta bu ste /
translated: Such is the mass of merit that arises from the Buddha.

original: gang dag bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du log par ltung bar 'gyur ba de dag tu 'gro bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang dag bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du log par ltung bar 'gyur ba de dag tu 'gro bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Those who have planted roots of virtue with the Buddha will not go to those places where one falls into the lower realms for eons as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River.

original: de ltar sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
analyzed: de ltar sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
translated: Thus, the planting of roots of virtue with the Buddha is inconceivable.

original: mtshams med pa @15b las byung ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa ma gtogs te /
analyzed: mtshams med pa @15b las byung ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa ma gtogs te /
translated: Except for those who have committed the heinous acts and those who have maligned the noble ones.

original: de dag kyang yun ring po 'das nas ji ltar smon lam btab pa bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag kyang yun ring po 'das nas ji ltar smon lam btab pa bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: After a long time, they will pass into parinirvāṇa, just as they had wished.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: sdig pa'i las thams cad ni mi bya ste /
analyzed: sdig pa'i las thams cad ni mi bya ste /
translated: I have taught that all evil actions should not be done,

original: yang ngas sdong dum tshig pa la'ang gnod sems bskyed par mi bya na mir gyur pa lta la ci smos zhes bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: yang ngas sdong dum tshig pa la'ang gnod sems bskyed par mi bya na mir gyur pa lta la ci smos zhes bstan pa yin te /
translated: and that one should not even give rise to ill will toward a burnt-out log, let alone a human being.

original: de dag la'ang zhe sdang bskyed na sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma'i lus len par 'gyur na /
analyzed: de dag la'ang zhe sdang bskyed na sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma'i lus len par 'gyur na /
translated: If one gives rise to anger even toward those, one will take on a body with many kinds of suffering in the great hells.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mos pa dang ba'i rjes su 'brang ba dang ldan pa lta la ci smos /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mos pa dang ba'i rjes su 'brang ba dang ldan pa lta la ci smos /
translated: What need is there to mention those who follow the faith in the teachings of the Tathāgata?

original: gang de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa la zhe sdang skyed pa lta ci smos te /
analyzed: gang de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa la zhe sdang skyed pa lta ci smos te /
translated: What need is there to mention those who give rise to anger toward the Tathāgata, who possesses infinite wisdom?

original: skyes bu glen pa de dag bskal pa gcig gam /
analyzed: skyes bu glen pa de dag bskal pa gcig gam /
translated: Those foolish people will remain in the hells for one eon,

original: gnyis sam / gsum nas /
analyzed: gnyis sam / gsum nas /
translated: two eons, three eons,🔽and so forth, up to

original: bskal pa brgya'i bar du'ang de dag ldang bar ma mthong ste /
analyzed: bskal pa brgya'i bar du'ang de dag ldang bar ma mthong ste /
translated: I do not see them rising up even in a hundred eons.

original: de dag ni bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du'ang de las ldang ba med do //
analyzed: de dag ni bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du'ang de las ldang ba med do //
translated: They do not rise up even in a hundred thousand eons.

original: gang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di la spong ba de dag ni sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro zhes ngas bshad do //
analyzed: gang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di la spong ba de dag ni sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro zhes ngas bshad do //
translated: I say that those who reject this enlightenment of the Buddhas will suffer.

original: gang dag yang gnyis su mi gsung ba'i tshig chos kyi tshul rnam par dag pa la spong bar mi byed pa de dag thams cad kyi phyir mi ldog par byas nas gdod sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ro zhes de ltar sems bskyed par bya'o //🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad cu pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i spos kyis bdugs pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom @16a *//
analyzed: gang dag yang gnyis su mi gsung ba'i tshig chos kyi tshul rnam par dag pa la spong bar mi byed pa de dag thams cad kyi phyir mi ldog par byas nas gdod sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ro zhes de ltar sems bskyed par bya'o // sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad cu pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i spos kyis bdugs pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom @16a *//
translated: Those who do not reject the pure way of the Dharma, the words that do not teach duality, for their sake I will generate the thought: ‘I will turn them away from all that is not the way to enlightenment and establish them in the irreversible stage, and then I will make them into Buddhas.’

original: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos dpag med snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
analyzed: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos dpag med snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
translated: “Eighty Buddha-fields from here, in the world-system called Perfumed with the Ocean of Incense, dwells the Tathāgata Arhat Samyaksaṃbuddha Apramāṇakusumasaṃpūrṇaprabhāsa.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: “Śāriputra,

original: yang de bzhin gshegs pa spos dpag med snang ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan gang dag thos par 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa dang / yid la byed na /
analyzed: yang de bzhin gshegs pa spos dpag med snang ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan gang dag thos par 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa dang / yid la byed na /
translated: Moreover, those who hear the name of the Tathāgata Apramāṇaprabhāsa of Fragrance and, having heard it, aspire to it with an exalted intention and keep it in mind,

original: de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
translated: all of them will not turn back from unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas kyang ba spu'i gseb thams cad nas dri yid du 'ong zhing phyogs su snang bar byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas kyang ba spu'i gseb thams cad nas dri yid du 'ong zhing phyogs su snang bar byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And having attained unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment, from all the pores of their skin there will emerge a pleasant fragrance that illuminates the directions.

original: yang shes rab dman pas ni ye shes chen po 'di la smon par mi nus so //
analyzed: yang shes rab dman pas ni ye shes chen po 'di la smon par mi nus so //
translated: Moreover, those of inferior wisdom are unable to aspire to this great wisdom.

translated: The Tathāgata Mahākaruṇika, because he is intent on benefiting sentient beings, even though he resides in another world-realm, protects sentient beings from the harm of the evil Māra.

original: de nas shi 'phos pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas shi 'phos pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: Then, after they die and transmigrate, they are reborn in the Sukhāvatī world-realm.

original: de dag thams cad kyis de nyid du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyis de nyid du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: All of them will there complete the qualities of a Buddha.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can skye ba theg pa chen po la zhugs pa de dag gi bsam pa thams cad bdag gis bkang bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can skye ba theg pa chen po la zhugs pa de dag gi bsam pa thams cad bdag gis bkang bar bya ste /
translated: Because that Tathāgata has said, “I will fulfill all the wishes of those sentient beings who have entered the Great Vehicle and are reborn in my Buddha-field when I attain Awakening.

original: de ni gang la la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos byang chub byed pa gang ci yod pa'o //
analyzed: de ni gang la la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos byang chub byed pa gang ci yod pa'o //
translated: Whatever qualities of the factors of Awakening there are that lead to Awakening,

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa can gang dag sangs @36a *//
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa can gang dag sangs @36a *//
translated: Those who are in the Śrāvaka Vehicle will think, We are not able to attain the wisdom of the Tathāgata.

original: rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba de nyid du dgra bcom par gyur cig ces smon lam de ltar btab bo //
analyzed: rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba de nyid du dgra bcom par gyur cig ces smon lam de ltar btab bo //
translated: He made the aspiration that those who were in the Śrāvaka Vehicle would be reborn in that buddha realm and become arhats.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /🔽rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Śāriputra,🔽if any sons or daughters of good family in the future have faith in the description of Amitābha’s qualities,

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig phyi ma'i dus na 'od dpag med kyi yon tan brjod pa la dad par byed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas dga' ba skyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de la lhag pa'i bsam pas rangs par byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes te /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig phyi ma'i dus na 'od dpag med kyi yon tan brjod pa la dad par byed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas dga' ba skyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de la lhag pa'i bsam pas rangs par byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes te /
translated: give rise to joy with superior intention, and delight in that tathāgata with superior intention, they will be reborn in that buddha realm.

original: de na gnas pa rnams bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing de dag ji ltar brjod pa bzhin byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de na gnas pa rnams bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing de dag ji ltar brjod pa bzhin byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: While dwelling there, all their wishes will be fulfilled, and they will approach awakening just as they have described.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa de'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa de'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will also see that assembly of tathāgatas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can skyes pa de dag mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can skyes pa de dag mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will see those beings who have been reborn in that buddha realm.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan brjod pa de la yid ches par mi byed pa dang / 'phya ba dang / spong bar 'gyur ba de dag ni bskal pa lngar sems can dmyal ba'i las yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan brjod pa de la yid ches par mi byed pa dang / 'phya ba dang / spong bar 'gyur ba de dag ni bskal pa lngar sems can dmyal ba'i las yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who do not believe in the description of the qualities of the Tathāgata, who mock it and reject it, will take up the karma of the hells for five eons.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi tha ma na 'jig rten gyi khams bdud thams cad rab tu bcom pa dang ldan pa na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi tha ma na 'jig rten gyi khams bdud thams cad rab tu bcom pa dang ldan pa na /
translated: In the last of a thousand times a hundred thousand buddhafields, in the world system Endowed with the Subjugation of All Maras,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba mnga' ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba mnga' ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
translated: the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, called Vijayasambhava, dwells.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal pa mnga' ba de'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba de dag ni bdud kyi zhags pa thams cad bcad @36b par 'gyur /
analyzed: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal pa mnga' ba de'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba de dag ni bdud kyi zhags pa thams cad bcad @36b par 'gyur /
translated: those who hear the name of the Tathāgata Vijayasambhava will cut through all the bonds of Māra,

original: bskal pa drug cur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bskal pa drug cur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: and will turn away from saṃsāra for sixty eons.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi tha ma na 'jig rten gyi khams bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi tha ma na 'jig rten gyi khams bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa na /
translated: At the end of a hundred thousand buddhafields, in the world called Destroyer of All Demons,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
translated: there dwells the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha Victorious Melody.

original: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba de dag ni sgra dbyangs thams cad kyi smra ba dang ldan par 'gyur /
analyzed: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba de dag ni sgra dbyangs thams cad kyi smra ba dang ldan par 'gyur /
translated: Those who hear the name of that thus-gone one will attain the eloquence of all melodious sounds.

original: bdud sdig can yang rgyang ring por yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdud sdig can yang rgyang ring por yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will also keep the evil Māra at a distance.

original: de dag bskal pa brgyad du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas pa 'gyur ro ////🔽bam po gsum pa ste tha ma /
analyzed: de dag bskal pa brgyad du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas pa 'gyur ro //// bam po gsum pa ste tha ma /
translated: They will turn their backs on saṃsāra for eight eons.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the bodhisattva great being Ajita said to the Blessed One,🔽“Blessed One, I too will recite the dhāraṇī mantra that protects one from the eight dangers and that was taught by the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha Splendorous with the Radiance of the King of Jewels.”

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na /
translated: that bodhisattva great beings can possess

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing /

analyzed: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos 'ga' mchis sam / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: and that will enable them to swiftly awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood?”

original: ma pham pa /
analyzed: ma pham pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied to the bodhisattva great being Ajita, “Ajita,🔽there is.

original: yod do // byang phyogs kyi logs na 'jig rten gyis khams dpal brtsegs pa na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa dgra @37a *//
analyzed: yod do // byang phyogs kyi logs na 'jig rten gyis khams dpal brtsegs pa na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra @37a *//
translated: On the northern side, in the world system Glorious Mound,

original: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
analyzed: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
translated: the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha Glorious Essence Mound Renowned King resides.

original: ma pham pa /
analyzed: ma pham pa /
translated: Ajita,

original: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te /
translated: All those who listen to the name of the Thus-Gone One Glorious Essence of Splendor and King of Proclamation will never turn back from unsurpassed and perfect awakening.

original: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will swiftly awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood.

original: bskal pa bye ba tshang bar 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bskal pa bye ba tshang bar 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will turn their backs on saṃsāra for a full ten million eons.

original: ma pham pa /
analyzed: ma pham pa /
translated: Ajita,

original: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po'i mtshan nyan pa ni sangs rgyas lnga bcu'i drung du spyad pa yin te /
analyzed: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po'i mtshan nyan pa ni sangs rgyas lnga bcu'i drung du spyad pa yin te /
translated: those who listen to the name of the Thus-Gone One Glorious Essence of Splendor and King of Proclamation have practiced in the presence of fifty buddhas.

analyzed: de nas shi 'phos nas kyang nam du'ang rdzu 'phrul dang bral bar mi 'gyur /

analyzed: mya ngan las yongs su ma 'das kyi bar du rna ba dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur /

analyzed: nam du'ang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur /
translated: They will never be without perfect form.

original: nam du'ang gsad pa dang / bcing bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: nam du'ang gsad pa dang / bcing bar mi 'gyur /
translated: They will never be killed or bound.

original: rna ba'i nad mi 'byung /🔽sna nad mi 'byung /
analyzed: rna ba'i nad mi 'byung / sna nad mi 'byung /

analyzed: lce nad mi 'byung /

original: lus kyi nad mi 'byung ste /
analyzed: lus kyi nad mi 'byung ste /
translated: They will not have body diseases.

analyzed: mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du de dag nam du'ang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas med pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang bral bar mi skye ste /
translated: Until they have passed into parinirvāṇa, they will never be born in a world system without a buddha or in a world system without the appearance of a buddha.

original: nam du'ang @37b chos dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: nam du'ang @37b chos dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur /
translated: They will never be without the Dharma.

original: nam du 'ang mi khom par skye bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: nam du 'ang mi khom par skye bar mi 'gyur /

original: nam du'ang bslab pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: nam du'ang bslab pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur /
translated: They will never be without training.

original: nam du'ang dran pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: nam du'ang dran pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur /

analyzed: mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du nam du'ang ye shes dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Until they have passed into parinirvāṇa, they will never be without wisdom.

original: ma pham pa /
analyzed: ma pham pa /
translated: “Ajita,

original: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba dang / nga'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang yid ches shing mos pa dang / mngon par dad pa de dag thams cad gnas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba dang / nga'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang yid ches shing mos pa dang / mngon par dad pa de dag thams cad gnas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur /
translated: Those who listen to the name of the Tathāgata, who have confidence in my omniscience, who have faith and deep reverence, will all attain a state of excellence.

analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchog dang / dam pa dang / rab mchog dang / bla na med pa yang 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de bas na gnas thams cad yongs su 'dzin par 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mchog tu gyur par gnas par 'dod pa dang / dam pa dang / rab mchog tu gyur par gnas bar 'dod pa des /
translated: Therefore, those who wish to attain a state of excellence, who wish to be the best in the entire world, who wish to attain a state of excellence that is the most excellent and supreme,

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i mtshan mnyan par bya'o //
translated: should listen to the name of the Tathāgata, who is the best in the entire world.

original: thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes phyag bya'o //
analyzed: thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes phyag bya'o //
translated: Having heard it, they should pay homage to the Blessed One, the thus-gone, the worthy one, the perfect Buddha Glorious Essence of Mountains Resounding King.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
translated: Having said this,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ji tsam du ring /
translated: “Blessed One,🔽how far is the world in which that thus-gone one resides?

original: @38a *// de bzhin gshegs pa de byung nas ji srid lags /
analyzed: @38a *// de bzhin gshegs pa de byung nas ji srid lags /
translated: How long has it been since that thus-gone one appeared?”

translated: When he had thus spoken, the Blessed One said to the bodhisattva great being Ajita,🔽“Ajita,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: dpag tshad brgya khor yug tu bye ma'i phung por gyur pa de las bye ma'i 'bru re re blangs te /

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa zhes bya ba de yod de /
translated: Beyond worlds as numerous as the grains of sand in the Ganges, there is a world called Heap of the Essence of Glory.

translated: In that world, the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha Heap of the Essence of Glory with a Resounding Voice resides.

original: 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
analyzed: 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
translated: He is alive and well and teaches the Dharma.

original: ma pham pa /
analyzed: ma pham pa /
translated: Ajita,

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bskal par lon te /
translated: the Tathāgata Śrīgarbheśvara­rāja has been a buddha for an eon.
